ChatStampName.165: Turn it all the way to 11000
ChatStampName.79: 50 meters away from the finish line.
ChatStampName.194: Psst!! You think you can beat me?!
ChatStampName.214: Man… I can’t wait to crush you…
ChatStampName.50: You better show me what you’ve got!
ChatStampName.180: You really know how to drive!
ChatStampName.251: Deny it all you want — I’m the Devil Z you can’t shake!
ChatStampName.258: Can you stop messing around and floor it, bro?
ChatStampName.181: Feels like you’re really pushing my buttons…
ChatStampName.216: Yeah, don’t start acting all fancy, okay?
ChatStampName.196: Let’s see how you handle this…
ChatStampName.187: Time to reveal what this ride’s really capable of.
ChatStampName.30: I know this road inside and out!
ChatStampName.31: I know this road like no one else!
ChatStampName.33: This road’s kinda rough for me…
ChatStampName.172: I’ve figured out the secret to this road!!
ChatStampName.182: This one fight will show what I’m really made of!
ChatStampName.123: When I win this fight, I…
ChatStampName.124: If I win this showdown, I…
ChatStampName.126: If I get beaten here, I…
ChatStampName.125: If I lose this fight, then I…
ChatStampName.153: A car without these? That’s no car.
ChatStampName.232: Might have my hands full here…
ChatStampName.174: This is turning into a damn lesson.
ChatStampName.179: Hell, with moves like that, you might as well fly!
ChatStampName.188: Got that pure vibe right now…
ChatStampName.257: It’s only when you reach that point you understand what’s really out there.
ChatStampName.256: Is that your beast to tame?
ChatStampName.250: Devil or not, this is my machine.
ChatStampName.81: Shit, this road’s not my thing.
ChatStampName.225: Where’s my opening to slip by…?
ChatStampName.161: There’s an exception to every rule…!!
ChatStampName.65: I’m gonna smoke you out there!
ChatStampName.66: I’ll leave you eating my dust!
ChatStampName.142: That’s one odd name for a car…
ChatStampName.219: Well… I can live with that.
ChatStampName.155: Heh… you just keep getting faster, don’t you…
ChatStampName.107: Enough, I can’t take any more!
ChatStampName.73: Shit.  I’m up against a crazy one…
ChatStampName.74: Damn… got matched with a maniac…
ChatStampName.170: Now I know… his weak spot…!!
ChatStampName.37: Take a good look… this car is my pride.
ChatStampName.149: You’re not even on my radar.
ChatStampName.185: Flat out, that’s the basic rule of AWD!
ChatStampName.143: Press the gas, and it goes.
ChatStampName.156: I’m on a full adrenaline rush!!
ChatStampName.36: See for yourself… my ride’s the real deal!
ChatStampName.167: He’s coming in way too hot, he’ll never make it!
ChatStampName.183: This is giving me chills — the ultimate battle!
ChatStampName.177: We’ll crash together if we have to.
ChatStampName.186: How about a shot of high-octane for you?!
ChatStampName.189: I’ll never look in the rearview again.
ChatStampName.144: Hit the brake, and it stops.
ChatStampName.235: I’ll end this right here & now!!
ChatStampName.220: Got a trick up your sleeve?
ChatStampName.150: Can you keep up with my R!?
ChatStampName.255: ’Cause I’m betting it all on this!
ChatStampName.17: We’re going all out in this fight!
ChatStampName.16: This is a full throttle fight!
ChatStampName.84: Maybe I could win this one…?
ChatStampName.83: It’s not like I can’t win… right?
ChatStampName.163: It means one thing, I’m here to finish this fight!
ChatStampName.148: That shows you suck at right turns!!
ChatStampName.157: Like hell I’m letting you pass on the outside!!
ChatStampName.8: We’ll take it easy. Drive safe!
ChatStampName.229: Having a bit of trouble pushing through…
ChatStampName.23: How about a little fun run?
ChatStampName.160: I’m about to slam into the wall!!
ChatStampName.190: The kind who dominates these mountain roads…
ChatStampName.94: I wonder if holding back is necessary?
ChatStampName.197: The tuition fee’s gonna be expensive, you know?
ChatStampName.176: Looks like a $500 body repair job…
ChatStampName.72: I wonder if you’ll entertain me?
ChatStampName.230: I’ll be the one to give you a welcome.
ChatStampName.198: Come at me like your life depends on it.
ChatStampName.173: Charge in like you’re ready to die!!
ChatStampName.116: I feel like I’m about to cry…
ChatStampName.234: There’s no shortage in my opponent.
ChatStampName.171: This is pointless… with car control that weak…
ChatStampName.252: No one runs ahead of the Blackbird—
ChatStampName.69: I don’t feel like I can lose!
ChatStampName.254: For the pride and experience I’ve built from racing nonstop.
ChatStampName.164: The gap between fast & slow cars is obvious.
